attributes.action: RESPECT OUR FREEDOM OF CHOICE AS ADULTS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: AS ADULTS WE HAVE THE RIGHT OF CHOICE TO SMOKE IF WE WISH,AS ITS NOT A CRIME & YOU EARN MILLIONS IN TAXES FROM US SMOKERS EVERY YEAR & HAVE DONE SO FOR DECADES, WE TOO HAVE THE RIGHT TO HAVE OUR NEEDS TAKEN INTO ACCOUNT AS WELL AS THE NON SMOKING PERSONS, CATER FOR EVERY ADULT IN THE UK BY LETTING RETAIL OUTLETS TO OPT FOR TOTAL SMOKERS OR NON SMOKERS, THUS EVERYONE IS FAIRLY CATERED FOR & THEN EVERY ADULT HAS A CHOICE WHERE TO EAT OR DRINK WITHOUT CAUSING ANY HARM OR DISTRESS TO ANYONE ELSE.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
